Package nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp30.application

Class ChapsChallenge

  • java.lang.Object
    • nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp30.application.ChapsChallenge
  • public class ChapsChallenge
extends java.lang.Object
    The Chaps Challenge class purpose is to control the main game loop, this includes the implementation of the game states and what the game should do when the state is entered or exited.
    Author:
    jakeh
